# id

**Instance Property**

A unique command ID for the immersive media file.

## Declaration

```swift
var id: Int { get }
```

## Instance Properties

- **duration**: The duration of the command.
- **offset**: The offset from the start time of this command.
- **time**: The time this command starts during playback.

items.description: The offset from the start time of this command.
